Overview Chapter

class CGOBWidgetParent

Constructors and Destructors
CGOBWidgetParentSet default values.
~CGOBWidgetParentRemove all children and deletes all childrens data.
Operations
ActivateChild Move inactive child from inactive list to active list.
AddChild Add widget to active list.
AddInActiveChild Add widget to inactive list.
Center Centers this widget within passed rect size.
DeActivateChild Move active child from active list to inactive list.
FindObject Find an object using its ID.
RemoveChild Remove widget from active list.
RemoveInActiveChild Remove widget from inactive list.
SetBackgroundImage Set the backgound image and parameters.
Overridables
FindMouseObjectThis will search children widgets and if a child is a parent it will search its children and so on.
MoveMove this widget and all children widgets along with it.
Data Members
public
CBiOutList< class CGOBWidget> m_ActiveList;Linked list of children widgets. This list is only a list of pointers. Objects do not get destroyed automatically when removed from list.
CBiOutList< class CGOBWidget> m_InActiveList;Linked list of inactive children widgets. This is used to add children but not to the scene, which allows automatic cleanup by the destructor.
CGOBImage* m_pBGImage;Background image for this parent.
